block.p: KAPLAN-Ruth. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Jacob. Devoted mother of Dr. Daniel and Sylvia Kaplan, Florence and Dr. Mark Lazar and Sydell and Sol Kopf. Dear sister of Dr. Charles Brauer, Florence Weiner and Sylvia Chessler. Loving grandmother of Laura Kaplan, Charles and Jody Kaplan, Dr. Russell & Randy Rothenberg, Lisa and Bob Krizman, Barbara Selwyn and Drs. Steven and Jan Lazar. Cherished great grandmother of Zachary & Ben Jacob Kaplan, Zachary, Amanda and Jesse Selwyn, Molly and Meredith Lazar, Mitchell Rothenberg and Jeffrey Krizman. Services at Baron Hirsch Cemetery, Staten Island, NY, Friday, 1 PM. For further info ''Wien & Wien'', Englewood, NJ. 800-322-0533.
